mapper.insert: insert into member( MEM_NUM, MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_SUMMONER, MEM_POSITION, MEM_TIME, MEM_JOINDATE, MEM_TIER ) values ( mem_num_seq.nextval, #{MEM_ID}, #{MEM_PW}, #{MEM_NAME}, #{MEM_EMAIL}, #{MEM_SUMMONER}, #{MEM_POSITION}, #{MEM_TIME}, SYSDATE, #{MEM_TIER} )
mapper.update: update member set mem_verify='Y' where mem_email=#{MEM_EMAIL}
